text: @toryboypierce @COVID19 @MattHancock Tbf, he has just presided over 40,000 deaths so, yeah, he will "still be criticised". Lets start with 105k people per week still entering the UK untested and astonomical nursing home deaths that have followed a decade of NHS cuts that already meant 4 million on waiting lists.
